channel.title: oslo on Suburban Nerd
channel.description: Recent content in oslo on Suburban Nerd

item.title: Burning the candle at both ends part II
item.description: In addition to recent fatherhood and doing my own startup and taking over the leadership of the Oslo Perl Mongers, I've started a project to get a hacker space set up in Oslo. Actually, this ties in to my Oslo Perl Mongers interests as well, so it's not a completely new project. I got very inspired by @kyrah's talk about metalab.at in Wien at FSCons in Gothenburg a couple of weeks ago.

item.title: Burning the candle at both ends.
item.description: In addition to recent fatherhood and doing my own startup, I am now the leader of the Oslo Perl Mongers. Look forward to tech talks from Oslo.pm in the months to come. :)
